attributes.action: Provide multi operator bus tickets for preston bus and stagecoach buses
attributes.additional_details: To help people of all ages to get to work , school , hospital appointments , wherever they have to go in preston , on time because certain buses are missed out often up to an hour late but if we could get on both the buses that run on the same routes eg the hospital  it would make a big differance on time waiting and the stress on a daily basis of getting anywhere on time
attributes.background: Create a bus ticket , day pass , weekly , monthly that can be used in preston on both stagecoach and preston buses

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about ticketing for local public transport are a matter for relevant transport providers and local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
